questions_answers.subject: ComfyUI-Portrait-Master
questions_answers.question: What new features were introduced in version 1.5 of ComfyUI-Portrait-Master?
questions_answers.answer: Version 1.5 introduced updated nationality list (193 options), new options for face shape, facial expression, facial asymmetry, dimples, and bug fixes and optimizations.

questions_answers.subject: ComfyUI-Portrait-Master
questions_answers.question: What changes were made to the hair styles in version 2.9 of ComfyUI-Portrait-Master?
questions_answers.answer: Version 2.9 has an updated hair style list with 117 items.

questions_answers.subject: ComfyUI-Portrait-Master
questions_answers.question: What new options were added in version 2.1 of ComfyUI-Portrait-Master?
questions_answers.answer: Version 2.1 introduced new options for body type, wrinkles, beard, tanned skin, added a new workflow with 2 groups of ControlNet nodes for pose and hand control, and added examples.

questions_answers.subject: ComfyUI-Portrait-Master
questions_answers.question: What was added to the workflow in version 2.0 of ComfyUI-Portrait-Master?
questions_answers.answer: Version 2.0 added upscaler in the workflow and ControlNet in the workflow for pose control.

questions_answers.subject: ComfyUI-Portrait-Master
questions_answers.question: How many model poses are available in version 2.6 of ComfyUI-Portrait-Master?
